name: TriJinx: A Kristine Kross Mystery™
description: Welcome to the world of TriJinx – an action-puzzle with a tumbling twist! It’s Egypt in 1935 and you are trapped in the tomb of TriClops! Can you outrun this triangle trap? Match triangles and clear colors as you help Kristine Kross on her quest to find her missing father and escape.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000, XP, VistaProcessor: Pentium III® 700 MHz minimumMemory: 128 MB RAMHard Drive: 40 MB of free spaceDirectX®: DirectX 7.0 or later
